SELECT OD_ATTACH_FILE.OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID , OD_ATTACH_FILE.FILE_NAME , OD_ATTACH_FILE.DATA , OD_ATTACH_FILE.DELETE_FLAG , OD_ATTACH_FILE.SEND_FLAG , OD_ATTACH_FILE.VESSEL_ID , OD_ATTACH_FILE.DATA_NO , OD_ATTACH_FILE.USER_KEY , OD_ATTACH_FILE.RENEW_DATE , OD_ATTACH_FILE.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_ATTACH_FILE.TS
FROM OD_ATTACH_FILE

WHERE OD_ATTACH_FILE.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND (OD_ATTACH_FILE.OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID IN (SELECT OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID FROM OD_THI_ITEM WHERE OD_THI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 AND OD_THI_ITEM.OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID IS NOT NULL AND OD_THI_ITEM.OD_THI_ID = :OD_THI_ID) OR OD_ATTACH_FILE.OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID IN (SELECT OD_THI_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID FROM OD_THI_SHOUSAI_ITEM INNER JOIN OD_THI_ITEM ON OD_THI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 AND OD_THI_ITEM.OD_THI_ITEM_ID = OD_THI_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_THI_ITEM_ID AND OD_THI_ITEM.OD_THI_ID = :OD_THI_ID WHERE OD_THI_SHOUSAI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 AND OD_THI_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID IS NOT NULL))

INSERT INTO OD_ATTACH_FILE ( OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID , FILE_NAME , DATA , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID , :FILE_NAME , :DATA , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE OD_ATTACH_FILE SET FILE_NAME = :FILE_NAME , DATA = :DATA , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID = :OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID AND TS = :TS
